name: Psionic Meditation
description: Meditative techniques to enhance mental clarity and increase psionic awareness.

cards.title: Breath Control for Psionic Awareness
cards.description: Breathing techniques to enhance focus and psionic perception.
cards.bulletpoints: Deep Breathing Cycles, Energy Alignment, Mind-Body Synchronization
cards.summaryText: Use slow, rhythmic breaths to quiet noise and feel energy flows sharpen with each inhale.

cards.title: Third Eye Activation
cards.description: Guided meditation for opening and strengthening the third eye.
cards.bulletpoints: Visualization Training, Sensory Expansion, Chakra Focus
cards.summaryText: Anchor attention between the brows and visualize light there until intuitive impressions brighten.
